```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

First we regress all other variales on mpg.

```{r cars}
input            <- mtcars
input$am         <- as.factor(input$am)
levels(input$am) <- c('AT', 'MT')

fit <- fit_all<-lm(mpg~.,data=input)
summary(fit)
```
